description: Open Concept 3 bedroom townhome in desirable 'Mckinney Creek Estates'.This property have a large partially covered deck area  (2 large gazebos)  with a sauna, fenced yard for privacy,  facing west unto a greenbelt for your utmost privacy. 2 levels with 3 bedrooms, built in pantry and double glazed windows throughout. A private 1 car garage and carport and an abundance of storage.  Bonus built in 2 tier  EV Charger System. Call for an easy private showing. All measurements to be verified. Complex has high speed fiber  optics
